column4: im reading about MATE, is it possible to install mate on this?
i cant really use this at all
try lxde or xfce or kde or even enlightenment
xfce is my favourite
never heard of enlightenment gui
there is e16 and e17, e16 is the stable branch
enlightenment is meant to be light on resources and rather flashy but i find it buggy and tacky looking
well i didnt really want to hack this up and start adding dif gui's, unless i cant really customize this
unity isn't very customisable, unless you want to break stuff
gnome3 isn't much better either
dont really need light, i have 8 gig ram
its new
unity isn't the way i'd use a computer (it tends to be better for touchscreens and netbooks)
i understand new, and am fine with new, im not fine with limited cause i need to actually use my pc
i like to use my pc too, which is why i don't use unity
i highly recomend xfce, thats rather customisable and gtk based
thank you for the help, im thinking its time for me to leave ubuntu and move on, i cant use this
no im going to stay with gnome, i like gnome, i just cant use this GUI like this, i cant use a limited desktop. im dl'ing debian
by gnome do you mean gnome2?
no debian testing is gnome 3
oh, i find gnome3 just as unusable as unity ::)
kde also uses qt rather than gtkm but xfce uses gtk just like gnome
